modName: Stannis Baratheon Follower from HBO Game of Thrones
summary: My new follower inspired to Stannis Baratheon from Game of Thrones tv series, Enjoy
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#7F6000][size=5][b]STANNIS BARATHEON[/b][/size][/color][color=#7F6000][b][size=5] Game of Thrones FOLLOWER[/size][/b][/color]
[b][size=5]

[/size][size=5][size=3]Stannis is now a STANDALONE FOLLOWER which means no other mods will be required.
Textures: SkySight Skins - Ultra HD 4K and 2K - Male Textures and
Real Feet Meshes by [b]fadingsignal[/b]
Default Weapon : Steel Sword.
Location : Four Seasons Inn, Dragon Bridge
Combat Style : Warrior 1H
[size=2][size=3]..and is unkillable
[size=5][b][size=3][size=4]AS ALWAYS..REPORT ME ANY ISSUE..THANK YOU!
HIGHLY RACCOMANDED - Face Light by [b]tktk[/b] here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?
[size=3][Credit]
[size=2][size=3]
・RaceMenu by [b]Expired[/b][/size] here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?[/size][/size][/size][/size][/b][/size]
[/size][/size][/size][/size][size=5][b][size=3]SkySight Skins - Ultra HD 4K and 2K - Male Textures and Real Feet Meshes by [b]fadingsignal
